pageTitle: Avalanche victims trapped for four hours, report says | CanyonCourier.com
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {22381=Four experienced backcountry snowboarders and a skier who died in an avalanche north of Loveland Pass on April 20 were buried four hours before a rescue was attempted, according to an investigation by the Colorado Avalanche Information Center., 22640=Officials originally estimated that the avalanche happened at 1 p.m., and rescuers arrived at 2 p.m. However, the avalanche actually occurred about 10:30 a.m., 28044=Canyon Courier | circulation@canyoncourier.com | 303-350-1030 27902 Meadow Drive, Ste 200, Evergreen, CO 80439 Office Hours are 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., Monday through Friday, 35364=Copyright © 2015}
